mapper.insert: insert into ms_zffp (mzxh, jgid, fphm, czgh, jzrq, mzlb, hzrq, zfrq, zfyy, jzlsh, ddbh, ddtksj, ref_traceno, t_ref_ordno, state ) values (#{mzxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jgid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fphm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czgh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mzlb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zfrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zfyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jzlsh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ddbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddtksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refTraceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tRefOrdno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: update ms_zffp set fphm = #{fphm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, czgh = #{czgh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jzrq = #{jzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mzlb = #{mzlb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, hzrq = #{hzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zfrq = #{zfrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zfyy = #{zfyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jzlsh = #{jzlsh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ddbh = #{ddbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ddtksj = #{ddtksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ref_traceno = #{refTraceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_ref_ordno = #{tRefOrdno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where mzxh = #{mzxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and jgid = #{jgid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select mzxh, jgid, fphm, czgh, jzrq, mzlb, hzrq, zfrq, zfyy, jzlsh, ddbh, ddtksj, ref_traceno, t_ref_ordno, state from ms_zffp
